tool_description: This API allows you to capture screenshots of webpages. It provides endpoints to generate webpage screenshots based on provided URL, width, and height parameters
name: Webpage screenshot
title: Webpage screenshot

api_list.name: Take screenshot
api_list.description: Take screenshot of web page from url
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://webpage-screenshot.p.rapidapi.com/capture_screenshot/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webpage-screenshot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://webpage-screenshot.p.rapidapi.com/capture_screenshot/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "webpage-screenshot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
